posts.post_content:
Hello,
Directly from my recent mini-find of 33 Turkey Reds. These cards have lived in Virginia for the last 100+ years and were passed down through the family of the original owner. 

This Cobb presents extremely well. The color, clarity and focus are perfect, the back is clean and the corners fine.  It's only issue is some light creasing/rippling in the lower right corner.  It hasn't been sent for grading.  I've had several hundred T3s graded by PSA and think this card has a chance at a 4. I can't guarantee that of course.  

If you have an interest in the card, please send me an email address I'll send a few more nice high resolution shots for you to review.  [url]Craigdiamondt3@yahoo.com[/url]

The card is for sale. Let's start the discussion at $7500.  

Thank you,
Craig
Wow. That's a beauty. Great colors. Good luck.
wow - one of the most beautiful cards in the hobby GL with the sale - stunning
